attributes.name: Harold's Rifle
attributes.description: "Harold would often practice his skills, sniping at those who tried to escape from the mines."
attributes.parsed_description: "Harold would often practice his skills, sniping at those who tried to escape from the mines."

attributes.name: Harrow
attributes.description: "They drag these about, turning the soil over on itself. Do not be fooled: their tools are deadly in their hands."
attributes.parsed_description: "They drag these about, turning the soil over on itself. Do not be fooled: their tools are deadly in their hands."

attributes.name: Hastate
attributes.description: "The Razor Tree springs to life once a millennium, awakened by the natural Azoth cycle. As it re-enters slumber, it sheds leaves sharper than a smith's blade."
attributes.parsed_description: "The Razor Tree springs to life once a millennium, awakened by the natural Azoth cycle. As it re-enters slumber, it sheds leaves sharper than a smith's blade."

attributes.name: Hatchet
attributes.description: It is clearly an older weapon, yet the haft shows no sign of rot.
attributes.parsed_description: It is clearly an older weapon, yet the haft shows no sign of rot.

attributes.name: Hatchet
attributes.description: It is clearly an older weapon, yet the haft shows no sign of rot.
attributes.parsed_description: It is clearly an older weapon, yet the haft shows no sign of rot.

attributes.name: Hatchet
attributes.description: It is clearly an older weapon, yet the haft shows no sign of rot.
attributes.parsed_description: It is clearly an older weapon, yet the haft shows no sign of rot.

attributes.name: Hatchet
attributes.description: It is clearly an older weapon, yet the haft shows no sign of rot.
attributes.parsed_description: It is clearly an older weapon, yet the haft shows no sign of rot.

attributes.name: Hatchet of the Arcane Tower
attributes.description: "The mages buried their noses in books while the world around them changed. But their research led to an enchanted hatchet capable of great destruction."
attributes.parsed_description: "The mages buried their noses in books while the world around them changed. But their research led to an enchanted hatchet capable of great destruction."

attributes.name: Hatchet of the Corrupted Frontier
attributes.description: "The Corrupted continously push south, seeking to corrupt all in their path and expand their reach."
attributes.parsed_description: "The Corrupted continously push south, seeking to corrupt all in their path and expand their reach."

attributes.name: Hatchet of the Enchanted Woods
attributes.description: "Legends say this axe once belonged to a great Elf woodsman. But of course, those are just legends..."
attributes.parsed_description: "Legends say this axe once belonged to a great Elf woodsman. But of course, those are just legends..."

attributes.name: Hatchet of the First Scout
attributes.description: "The elite guardian scouts kept their city safe for generations, forewarning of any impending assault by enemy forces."
attributes.parsed_description: "The elite guardian scouts kept their city safe for generations, forewarning of any impending assault by enemy forces."

attributes.name: Hatemark
attributes.description: “I will hunt you to the ends of the earth.”
attributes.parsed_description: “I will hunt you to the ends of the earth.”

attributes.name: Hatred's Bite
attributes.description: "Let it be done! Strike down your foes, unleash your wrath!"
attributes.parsed_description: "Let it be done! Strike down your foes, unleash your wrath!"

attributes.name: Haunted Hacker
attributes.description: "Forged in a soulfire smithy, the axe holds a shard of the smith's tormented soul."
attributes.parsed_description: "Forged in a soulfire smithy, the axe holds a shard of the smith's tormented soul."

attributes.name: Hawkfall
attributes.description: "You only ever hear it in the distance, but that's the sound of a small thing dying."
attributes.parsed_description: "You only ever hear it in the distance, but that's the sound of a small thing dying."

attributes.name: Headsman
attributes.description: "The weight does most of the work, as long as you keep the blade sharp, that is."
attributes.parsed_description: "The weight does most of the work, as long as you keep the blade sharp, that is."

attributes.name: Heart Beat
attributes.description: "The first and last thing you'll hear in life."
attributes.parsed_description: "The first and last thing you'll hear in life."

attributes.name: Heart of Corruption
attributes.description: "I may die, but corruption lives on."
attributes.parsed_description: "I may die, but corruption lives on."

attributes.name: Heart of the Greenwoods
attributes.description: "What dies shall be regrown."
attributes.parsed_description: "What dies shall be regrown."

attributes.name: Heartseeker
attributes.description: "Lead the wind and watch as it carries your arrow to its mark."
attributes.parsed_description: "Lead the wind and watch as it carries your arrow to its mark."

attributes.name: Heat of the Moment
attributes.description: "Passionate choices reveal our inner selves."
attributes.parsed_description: "Passionate choices reveal our inner selves."

attributes.name: Heatseeker
attributes.description: "Find the flame and light it."
attributes.parsed_description: "Find the flame and light it."

attributes.name: Heavensplitter
attributes.description: An odyssean spear whose form was handed down by the Ancient Guardians. Wrought from the Underworld, it is the spear that pierced the heavens.
attributes.parsed_description: An odyssean spear whose form was handed down by the Ancient Guardians. Wrought from the Underworld, it is the spear that pierced the heavens.

attributes.name: Heirloom Life Staff
attributes.description: "Passed down from generation to generation. Who shall you give this weapon to next?"
attributes.parsed_description: "Passed down from generation to generation. Who shall you give this weapon to next?"

attributes.name: Heirloom Musket
attributes.description: "Passed down from my grandmother to my father. I now give this to you."
attributes.parsed_description: "Passed down from my grandmother to my father. I now give this to you."

attributes.name: Heir's Domain
attributes.description: "To learn to rule is no easy task."
attributes.parsed_description: "To learn to rule is no easy task."

attributes.name: Hellsmasher
attributes.description: "I will travel through the seven circles of hell so long as it means defeating you."
attributes.parsed_description: "I will travel through the seven circles of hell so long as it means defeating you."

attributes.name: Hellsplitter
attributes.description: "Free us from the bonds of hell and give us life anew."
attributes.parsed_description: "Free us from the bonds of hell and give us life anew."

attributes.name: Hemogoblin
attributes.description: “The blade shutters and shakes with delight as it carves into its prey.”
attributes.parsed_description: “The blade shutters and shakes with delight as it carves into its prey.”

attributes.name: Herald of the Storm
attributes.description: "When they see the first arrow descend upon them, they shall know that we have arrived."
attributes.parsed_description: "When they see the first arrow descend upon them, they shall know that we have arrived."

attributes.name: Herald's Signal Fire
attributes.description: "Once the signal fires have been lit, all the hosts loyal to Mozrul the Herald will come to his aid, and nothing shall stand in his way."
attributes.parsed_description: "Once the signal fires have been lit, all the hosts loyal to Mozrul the Herald will come to his aid, and nothing shall stand in his way."

attributes.name: Herald's Signal Fire
attributes.description: The power is almost worth the stench of death and excrement that lingers on this ogre's bow.
attributes.parsed_description: The power is almost worth the stench of death and excrement that lingers on this ogre's bow.
